name: boost-mulch
effect: Causes soil to dry out in 4 hours.
short_effect: Causes soil to dry out in 4 hours.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
Mulch to be used in a Berry field.
It increases the Berry harvest that
can be grown by diligent watering.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A fertilizer for growing Berries. However, it appears
to be unsuitable for the soil in the Hoenn region and
has no effect.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:

to be unsuitable for the soil in the Hoenn region and
has no effect.
